title: Seared steak salad with sweet and sour dressing

instructions.step: Heat a frying pan over a medium-high heat. Trim the steak and brush with the oil. Season and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side for medium rare. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, for the dressing, mix together the garlic, ginger, sugar, lime juice, sesame oil and tamari. Toss the beetroot salad, carrot and pepper with ½ the dressing; arrange on a platter. Slice the steak and arrange on top of the salad, spooning over more dressing.
